attacks.name: Sudden Growth
attacks.effect: Attach any number of basic Energy cards from your hand to Politoed.

attacks.name: Frog Hop
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Energy Splash
attacks.effect: Move 2 Energy cards attached to Politoed to 1 or 2 of your Benched Pokémon. (You may put both on the same Pokémon, or 1 each on 2 different Pokémon.) If you have no Benched Pokémon, ignore this effect.
